Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hey! I need directions.
departing
mode
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
Transit from University to Airport.
departing time
When are you going to start your trip?
Now. Wait, did I book a ride? Can you tell me?
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]

DetailedTransitInstructions: Walk east for 14 minutes to the bus stop on Wilkins and Beechwood. The bus stop will be in front of a large red house.
Take the 67 and get off the University. It will take about 25 minutes and 16 stops.
Walk for 1 more block towards the tall brown building and turn right at the Starbucks.
Walk one block. You will pass a Chipotle on your left. Your destination will be on the right beside a red brick restaurant.

Events.Text: Take the 67 and get off the University. Can I proceed or do you require more detailed instructions?
Can toy just make sure I don't pass the school. I don't want to pass the school.

Events.Text: After one more block, your destination will be on the right. Do you know how to reach your destination or would you require more detailed instructions?
Okay, perfect. Now let's schedule a meeting.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 6 of 6]

Oh that stinks. Too much rain!!

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Alexis

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 314)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'University' to 'Airport') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Chicago or Chicago)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
